Creamy Avocado Chicken Salad


Ingredients
2 cooked chicken breast halves, diced
1 ripe avocado, sliced
½ cup sour cream
1 ½ teaspoons ground black pepper, or to taste
1 teaspoon lime juice
½ teaspoon garlic powder
½ teaspoon onion powder
¼ teaspoon salt

Cooking Instructions

Place chicken in a food processor; process until finely
chopped. Add avocado, sour cream, black pepper, lime juice,
garlic powder, onion powder, and salt; blend until smooth
(or the consistency you desire).
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/237284/creamy-avocado-chicken-salad/ 

Reference Video 

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Creamy Avocado Chicken Salad
